name: Digital Talking Book.  ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2005
description: NISO Digital Talking Book Standard, ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2005, defines the format and content of the electronic file set that comprises a digital talking book (DTB) and establishes a limited set of requirements for DTB playback devices.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://www.techstreet.com/products/1262105</field><field name="filenameExtension">opf, xml, ncx, mp4, mp3, wav</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
